Uses of Class
org.terrier.matching.daat.CandidateResult

  • Packages that use CandidateResult 
    Package Description
    org.terrier.matching.daat
    Provides classes that implement a document-at-a-time (DAAT) matching strategy.

    • Uses of CandidateResult in org.terrier.matching.daat

      class  FatCandidateResult
      A version of CandidateResult suitable for use within the Fat framework by FatCandidateResultSet.
